import React, { useState } from 'react' import { TextField, Button, Typography, Paper, FormControl, InputLabel, MenuItem, Select } from '@material-ui/core' import AddCircleRoundedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/AddCircleRounded' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import FileBase64 from 'react-file-base64' import useStyles from './styles.js' import { createUser } from '../../actions/users.js' const Registration = () => { const [postData, setPostData] = useState({ title: '', author: '', owner: JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('profile')).result.name, discription: '', image: '', category: '', keywords: [] }) const [keyword, setkeyword] = useState() const classes = useStyles() const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log(postData) dispatch(createUser(postData)) } const clear = e => { e.preventDefault() setPostData({ title: '', author: '', owner: JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('profile')).result.name, discription: '', image: '', category: '', keywords: [] }) } const addKeyword = e => { e.preventDefault() let key = e.target.value keyword.push(key) setPostData({ ...postData, keywords: keyword }) } return (
Add Book setPostData({ ...postData, title: e.target.value })} /> setPostData({ ...postData, author: e.target.value })} /> Category setPostData({ ...postData, image: base64 })} />
setPostData({ ...postData, discription: e.target.value }) } /> addKeyword} /> {postData.keywords && postData.keywords.map(key => { ; })}
setkeyword({ ...keyword, keyword: e.target.value })} />
) } export default Registration
